alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued June 16 at 9:16PM PDT until June 17 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 11 PM PDT FRIDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... For this evening, winds have diminished to below advisory thresholds. Winds will be 10-15 mph with gusts to 25 mph during the overnight. Therefore the Wind Advisory has been canceled early. * WHAT...South winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range, Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County, Northwestern Nye County and Northeastern Nye County. * WHEN...From 9 AM to 11 PM PDT Friday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County
